text: Working with Tom Hanks is a dream for any actor. It wasn ’ t any different for Emma Watson. The Harry Potter star shares it was an honour for her to share screen space with Hanks in their upcoming techno - thriller, The Circle. The film is being helmed by James Ponsoldt. “ Getting to act with Tom Hanks in any scene is bit of a dream. So like anything where it was the three of us ( Hanks, Ponsoldt and her ) it was kind of fun..., ” says the 27 - year - old. Tom Hanks plays the character of Eamon Bailey in the techno - thriller titled The Circle.
